title: Balinese Escape to Trendy Petitenget
description: Escape to exotic Bali in the heart of Petitenget, where some of the island’s hottest beach clubs, restaurants and boutiques are all at your fingertips. Enjoy a relaxing stay at the Swiss-Belhotel Petitenget with daily breakfast, a complimentary Indonesian two-course dining experience, private return airport transfers, a daily beer each, late 6pm checkout and much more included.
offer_address: Jl. Petitenget No.168, Kerobokan Kelod, Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Amazing Getaway in the Heart of Bali with Exotic Dining Experiences
description: Stay at a prime location in the heart of Bali at The Aveda Boutique Hotel (formerly Swiss-Belhotel Petitenget) near vibrant Seminyak. Moments away from Bali’s best nightlife, gorgeous beaches and beautiful scenery, The Aveda Boutique Hotel is a modern hotel with traditional Balinese flair. Make this your ultimate Bali holiday with daily dining experiences featuring authentic Balinese cuisine, daily buffet breakfast, one-way airport transfer and guaranteed 1pm late checkout.
offer_address: Jl. Petitenget 168, Seminyak, Bali Seminyak 80361 Bali Indonesia
